Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.misc

Class MyDate

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.misc.MyDate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<MyDate>
public class MyDate extends Object implements Comparable<MyDate>
Represents a date with a year, month, and day. This class is immutable and implements Comparable for comparing dates.

  • Constructor Details

    • MyDate

      public MyDate(int year, int month, int day)
      Constructs a MyDate instance with the specified year, month, and day.
      Parameters:
      year - the year of the date
      month - the month of the date, where 1 represents January and 12 represents December
      day - the day of the date, starting from 1

    • getDayOfWeek

      public int getDayOfWeek()
      Determines the day of the week for this date. The days of the week are represented as integers, where Monday is 1 and Sunday is 7. If the value has not been previously computed, it calculates the day of the week using the Java Time API and caches it for future retrieval.
      Returns:
      an integer representing the day of the week for this date, where Monday is 1 and Sunday is 7.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(MyDate that)
      Compares two MyDate objects for order. The comparison is performed first by year, then by month, and finally by day.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<MyDate>
      Parameters:
      that - the other MyDate object to compare against
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this MyDate is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified MyDate

    • getYear

      public int getYear()
      Retrieves the year component of this date.
      Returns:
      the year as an integer.

    • getMonth

      public int getMonth()
      Retrieves the month component of the date.
      Returns:
      the month of the date as an integer, where January is represented as 1, February as 2, and so on.

    • getDay

      public int getDay()
      Retrieves the day of the month represented by this date.
      Returns:
      the day of the month as an integer.
